function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"People working through illness due to need to make a living","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases due to infected individuals not taking time off to recover","Mitigation":"Implementing paid sick leave policies, raising awareness about the importance of taking time off when sick","Technologies":"","People":"Workers, individuals in informal sectors","Owner":"Government, employers, community organizations"},{"Description":"Limited ventilation increasing transmission risk","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases in confined spaces","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation in buildings, promoting outdoor activities, adopting air purification technologies","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Residents, occupants of confined spaces","Owner":"Building owners, urban planners, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate access to water and handwashing facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission due to lack of hand hygiene","Mitigation":"Providing accessible water points, promoting hand hygiene practices, subsidizing water costs","Technologies":"Water purification systems, mobile handwashing stations","People":"Residents of informal settlements","Owner":"Local authorities, NGOs, water and sanitation organizations"}]}
